summary: An amulet that allows multiple summons depending on conjuration skill level. I also added some spells to go with the Amulet
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Check Videos For More Info and No I Don't Have a Mic, Sorry.
[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][size=3]12-31-2014 NEW "Toy Makers Workshop" 
Added trapdoor next to one of Whiterun's guard towers along the outer wall. Trapdoor leads to the toy makers home or workshop. 
- Black smithing crafting stations 
- Non-respawning Storage chest 
- Junk 
- OH YEA, AND 3 NEW SPELL TO WORK WITH THE AMULET 
[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]- Might be way over powered lol[/size][/font]

I just recently started playing again and started using Perkus Maximus. I love the perk system but also love summoning large numbers of creatures. I did not want to mess with PerMa's perk system so i created an amulet that allows multiple summons depending on conjuration skill level. I also added some spells to go with the horde theme. 

* All items are level listed and can be found on merchants that sell magic and enemies that use magic 
* A sure bet to find amulet and starter spell is in the first hall of Bleakfalls Barrow 
* A cheat chest can be found in an abandoned prison 
* Amulet allows +3 Summons ever 25 conjure levels up to +9 Summons.
* A merchant in Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood to sell spells.[left][/left]

Summoned creatures will level with you and become very powerful good for someone like myself who uses lots of mods to make the game harder. IN NORMAL MODE THE CREATURES WILL BECOME OVERPOWERED [/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][u][b]Requires Dawnguard and DragonBorn[/b][/u][/size][/font]

[center][i][u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]When Updating Be Sure To Delete Previous Version.[/size][/font][/u][/i][/center]
author: Gamer3279
